arguments.value: setMembers

nodes.name: setMembers

devdoc.details: This contract is the base of the Hydro-Glacier dApp

isOwner().return: true if `msg.sender` is the owner of the contract.

params.amount: of HYDRO to lock Principal may be issued only when sufficient interest is locked in escrow as collateral.

payInterest(uint256).details: Pay interest to payee according to payment schedule

renounceOwnership().details: Allows the current owner to relinquish control of the contract.

repay(uint256,uint256).details: Payer repays the principal owed on the debt

params.amount: in HYDRO of principal to repay

setDuration(uint256,uint8,uint8).details: Set the End date when principal should be sent back to payer

params.apr: the APR for the debt ^ once set, cannot be edited or modified. defaults for other debt parameters are:  accrual daily, payment monthly, 1 year end date,

setMembers(uint256,address,uint8,bytes32.details: Set the payer and payee attributes

setPayments(uint256,uint8).details: Set the Payment Schedule, to be signed via Raindrop, determining how often interest payments are made to payee

transferOwnership(address).details: Allows the current owner to transfer control of the contract to a newOwner.

params.newOwner: The address to transfer ownership to.

withdrawInterest(uint256).details: Payer may withdraw interest from escrow in the event of disagreement with lender before principal is released

devdoc.title: Snowflake Glacier

renounceOwnership().notice: Renouncing to ownership will leave the contract without an owner. It will not be possible to call the functions with the `onlyOwner` modifier anymore.
